featured.text: In an airtight glass bottle in a kitchen cupboard. (D) In an airproof bottle next to a well-lighted window. 52.

definition.zh_def: 櫥櫃，通常用於儲存食物、器具或衣物的家具。
definition.en_def: A piece of furniture with shelves and doors, used for storing dishes, food, or other items.
definition.example: She placed the dishes back in the cupboard after washing them.
